content:
• Electronic Magazines & Newspapers delivered to your personal device by PressReader
  • Blazing fast Autobahn Wi-Fi throughout the hotel – unlimited device connections
  • Free printing and faxing
  • Use of public area iMac Computers & iPads
  • *Use of Stanford Court device library – available for loan: MacBook Air, Chromebook, iPod, Go Pro and more
  • Local & long distance calls
  • Locally roasted organic & free-trade Equator morning coffee and Mighty-Leaf teas
  • Coffee Bean in room coffee
  • Water bottles & Flowater filling stations throughout the hotel
  • *Day use of our Specialty New Albion bicycles and Blix ebikes.
  • *Use of our Yoga mats for free local Yoga sessions
  • *Use of our umbrellas on rainy days
  • A first-class fitness center experience with energizing tunes, cool towels & fresh fruit
  • Custom walking, jogging and bike maps
  • A curated, high-tech walking tour of Nob Hill & Chinatown
  • *limited supply available
